# My MTMR Preset

üåü [My TouchBar My rules](https://github.com/Toxblh/MTMR). The Touch Bar Customization App for your MacBook Pro with Touch Bar

<img
	style={{ objectFit: "contain", height: "400px", margin: "0 auto" }}
	src="/mtmr/thumbnail.webp"
/>

## Preview Preset

**Default View**

<img
	style={{ objectFit: "contain", margin: "0 auto" }}
	src="/mtmr/default.png"
/>

**Apple Menu (üçé) Group**

<img
	style={{ objectFit: "contain", margin: "0 auto" }}
	src="/mtmr/more-options.png"
/>

## Widgets

- Apple Menu (üçé) Group
  - Close, Illumination Down, Illumination Up, Brightness Down, Brightness, Brightness Up, Mute, Volume Down, Volume, Volume Up
- Mute
- Volume Down
- Volume
- Volume Up
- Network Speeds
- CPU Usage
- RAM Usage
- Weather (via OpenWeatherMap)
- Pepe the Frog emoji
- Battery Percentage (include remaining time)
- Date & Time (format: "dd/MMM/yyyy HH:mm")
- Another Pepe the Frog emoji

## Installation

### 1. Install MTMR Application

Download and install MTMR from [here](https://github.com/Toxblh/MTMR).

### 2. Grant accessibility permission

Follow the instructions in README file of MTMR repository to grant accessibility permission for MTMR application.

### 3. Update config file

1. Open config file of MTMR in `~/Library/Application Support/MTMR/items.json`
2. Replace the contents of `items.json` with the contents of my preset file

```json
[
	{
		"type": "group",
		"align": "left",
		"bordered": false,
		"title": "üçé",
		"width": 60,
		"items": [
			{
				"type": "close",
				"width": 50,
				"align": "left"
			},
			{
				"type": "illuminationDown",
				"align": "left",
				"width": 50
			},
			{
				"type": "illuminationUp",
				"align": "left",
				"width": 50
			},
			{
				"type": "brightnessDown",
				"align": "left",
				"width": 50
			},
			{
				"type": "brightness",
				"width": 200,
				"bordered": false,
				"align": "left",
				"image": {
					"base64": ""
				}
			},
			{
				"type": "brightnessUp",
				"align": "left",
				"width": 50
			},
			{
				"type": "mute",
				"align": "left",
				"width": 50
			},
			{ "type": "volumeDown", "width": 50, "align": "left" },

			{
				"type": "volume",
				"width": 200,
				"align": "left",
				"image": {
					"base64": ""
				}
			},
			{ "type": "volumeUp", "width": 30, "align": "left" }
		]
	},
	{
		"type": "mute",
		"bordered": true,
		"width": 40,
		"align": "left"
	},
	{ "type": "volumeDown", "width": 40, "align": "left" },
	{
		"type": "volume",
		"width": 150,
		"align": "left",
		"image": {
			"base64": ""
		}
	},
	{ "type": "volumeUp", "width": 40, "align": "left" },

	{ "type": "network", "width": 80, "align": "right", "bordered": false },
	{
		"type": "shellScriptTitledButton",
		"width": 80,
		"refreshInterval": 10,
		"source": {
			"inline": "top -l 2 -n 0 -F | egrep -o ' \\d*\\.\\d+% idle' | tail -1 | awk -F% '{p = 100 - $1; if (p > 30) c = \"\\033[33m\"; if (p > 70) c = \"\\033[30;43m\"; printf \"%s%4.1f%%\\n\", c, p}'"
		},
		"action": "appleScript",
		"actionAppleScript": {
			"inline": "activate application \"Activity Monitor\"\rtell application \"System Events\"\r\ttell process \"Activity Monitor\"\r\t\ttell radio button \"CPU\" of radio group 1 of group 2 of toolbar 1 of window 1 to perform action \"AXPress\"\r\tend tell\rend tell"
		},
		"align": "right",
		"image": {
			"base64": ""
		},
		"bordered": false
	},
	{
		"type": "appleScriptTitledButton",
		"source": {
			"inline": "set mem to do shell script \"ps -A -o %mem | awk '{s+=$1}END{print s}'\"\rreturn mem & \"%\""
		},
		"action": "appleScript",
		"actionAppleScript": {
			"inline": "activate application \"Activity Monitor\"\rtell application \"System Events\"\r\ttell process \"Activity Monitor\"\r\t\ttell radio button \"CPU\" of radio group 1 of group 2 of toolbar 1 of window 1 to perform action \"AXPress\"\r\tend tell\rend tell"
		},
		"refreshInterval": 5,
		"width": 70,
		"align": "right",
		"image": {
			"base64": ""
		}
	},
	{
		"type": "weather",
		"refreshInterval": 600,
		"align": "right",
		"units": "metric",
		"bordered": false,
		"icon_type": "text",
		"api_key": "your_api_key_here"
	},
	{
		"type": "",
		"width": 30,
		"align": "right",
		"bordered": false,
		"title": "",
		"image": {
			"filePath": "/Users/tin.phamv/New Folder/pepe/640487755197186048.webp"
		}
	},
	{
		"type": "battery",
		"width": 60,
		"align": "right",
		"bordered": false,
		"remainingtime": "yes",
		"image": {
			"base64": ""
		}
	},
	{
		"type": "timeButton",
		"width": 125,
		"align": "right",
		"bordered": false,
		"formatTemplate": "dd/MMM/yyyy HH:mm",
		"timeZone": "UTC+7"
	},
	{
		"type": "",
		"width": 30,
		"bordered": false,
		"title": "",
		"align": "right",
		"image": {
			"filePath": "/Users/tin.phamv/New Folder/pepe/56448-pepeflame.png"
		}
	}
]
```

### 4. Update image paths

Replace 2 pepe image with your own image by updating the `filePath` property in the image object.

- From this:

```json
"image": {
  "filePath": "/Users/tin.phamv/New Folder/pepe/640487755197186048.webp"
},
"image": {
  "filePath": "/Users/tin.phamv/New Folder/pepe/56448-pepeflame.png"
},
```

- To this:

```json
"image": {
  "filePath": "replace_with_your_image_path"
}
```

### 5. Update the weather widget API key.

Replace the open weather API key with your own key by updating the `api_key` property in the weather widget configuration.

- You can obtain an API key by signing up at [OpenWeatherMap](https://openweathermap.org/).
- Create new API key [here](https://home.openweathermap.org/api_keys)

```json
	{
		"type": "weather",
		"refreshInterval": 600,
		"align": "right",
		"units": "metric",
		"bordered": false,
		"icon_type": "text",
		"api_key": "your_api_key_here"
	},
```

### 6. Save and apply the preset

## Troubleshooting

- If MTMR does not start correctly after applying the preset, double-check the JSON syntax for any errors.
  - Ensure that the image file paths are correct and accessible.
  - Verify that the weather API key is valid and has not exceeded its usage limits.
- Restart MTMR after making changes to ensure the preset is applied.

## View more presets

https://github.com/Toxblh/MTMR-presets?tab=readme-ov-file
